editorialNotes.standard: Few things are more relaxing than settling down with a good coloring book—at least, until the kid we borrowed it from asks for it back. Pigment unleashes our grown-up creative energy with a surprisingly deep array of artist’s tools and tweaks. It even lets us automatically color within the lines, giving our productions a sheen of perfection. We expect a call from the gallery any day now.
